title: looking for buddy to play with
body:
now practicing riven watching youtube and try to play alot i think now i got almost perfect cancel aa :D

can discord but sometimes not. normally play at night like 8pm to 4am

im a koeran just wanna try to speak English and having friend who can play with.

pls feel free to add me

replies.body: Hey mate i added u if u want to play

Hey dude, S5 but happy to duo if you want to

Feel free to add me
